name: sustainable-source
description: A new development model that combines the best of open source and entrepreneurship.

scripts.devsetup: yarn install && local_modules link --force --dir src && ( cd src/app-contracts && yarn install ) && ( cd src/app-webapp && yarn install )
scripts.test: eslint . && ( cd src/app-contracts && yarn test ) && ( cd src/app-webapp && yarn test )
